Name: After the Inferno
About the game: This is an adult visual novel set in an original fantasy world. The game is heavy on story and characterization, interspersed with animated and voice acted cutscenes to bring the world to life, as well as world-building and lore entries for those interested in it. Pursue a romance with your favourite girl, or all of them, or none of them if you just want to experience the story. The choice is yours. War grips the Northern Reaches of Castria as the Isenian Empire continues its invasion, and you stand in the middle of it. The leader of a renowned mercenary company, you find yourself forced to adapt to new situations after the company faces major changes. Take the fight to the Empire and meet a diverse cast of characters willing to aid you in their own ways, each with their own backgrounds and motivations. Loyalties will shift, blood will be spilled, and romances will be fought for. A story set in an original fantasy world. 8 romanceable characters 26 animated sex scenes 23 animated and voice acted cutscenes Lore entries for those interested in the world Multiple endings
